title: Mobile Language Learning Design Utilizing Wearable Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage skills and foundational language learning knowledge
context.additional_context: Learning environment combining wearable devices and VR simulations to improve practical language skills for modern workplace professionals

learning_goals: Acquire and apply over 50 context-specific language expressions using wearable devices.
Improve communication skills by 30% through a real-time language feedback system in a VR simulation environment.
Develop one or more personalized language learning modules based on an understanding of mobile learning design principles.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
